## Usage

```{r lib-ex}
library(co2meter)

# current version
packageVersion("co2")

```

```{r ex-01}
init_co2_meter_dev()

print(read_co2()) # this can take a few seconds

print(read_co2()) # this can take a few seconds

print(read_co2()) # this can take a few seconds

close_dev()
```
